title: Other vehicles-For all non-residential, assembly and non- assembly occupancies, 10 per cent additional parking spaces, subject to a minimum of two spaces shall be provided in addition to what is prescribed in these Regulations
clause_text: Other vehicles-For all non-residential, assembly and non- assembly occupancies, 10 per cent additional parking spaces, subject to a minimum of two spaces shall be provided in addition to what is prescribed in these Regulations.
